title: The Cliff
description: Can a childhood pact a effect the lives of three adults?Love and betrayal surrounds the lives of lifelong friends LanieRhodes, Grant Bennett, and Dane Voight. Years ago, they madea pact to remain together as friends forever. The boys also madeanother secret pact that same day—to never vie for Lanie’s love.Grant and Lanie have secretly been pining for one anothersince they were children. Now grown up, they finally admittheir feelings for each other and what ensues is a twisted taleof deception as Dane does everything he can to stop them.The story weaves around this uneven love triangle.What will happen to the pact? Will friendships be destroyed?Will lovers emerge?
author: Christie A.C. Gucker
